static MultiWindowManager * mspInstance

Detailed Description

Base class used to control multi window environment staff. 

    //Get the isntance of MultiWindowManager
    mpMultiWindowMgr = MultiWindowManager::getInstance();

    //Enable multiwindow environment
    if (mpMultiWindowMgr != NULL) {
        mpMultiWindowMgr->enableMultiWindow();
    }

    //Disable multiwindow environment
    if (mpMultiWindowMgr != NULL) {
        mpMultiWindowMgr->disableMultiWindow(true);
    }

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::system::MultiWindowManager::MultiWindowManager ( ) [explicit, private]

Default ctor.

Could not direct instance, should use getInstance.

gaia::system::MultiWindowManager::~MultiWindowManager ( ) [private]

Default dtor.

MultiWindowManager is singleton, do not need delete.
